document_data.name: Yoshiie
document_data.mainbody: '''Yoshiie''' was a bandit leader in [[Kozakura]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Yoshiie led a bandit gang with more than 200 members, including [[korobokuru]], with a [[kensai]] second-in-command and sometimes a [[wu jen]] in his service. They were based in a secluded valley.
document_data.Personality: Yoshiie achieved his position through the use of fear, force, and brainpower. His men were like his children to him, but he was a stern "father" as the gang knew him. Yoshiie was protective and kind to his gang members, but had a harsh and unforgiving discipline. He received help from [[Kate Kenkichi]], but knew that one day his gang would split.
